body_html:
Finally Build succeeded with tensorflow r1.11 (i tried r1.5, 1.9 but they failed)
this time r1.11 build succeeded after 4.5 hours of compilation time!
before building, when i ran py config.py i had turned off ngraph support and didn't build with intel mkl library

it showed too many warnings while building.. after building the library it showed error when i execute below command
bazel-bin\tensorflow\tools\pip_package\build_pip_package C:/tmp/tensorflow_pkg

first i deleted simple_console_for_windows.zip which was 0 bytes then followed steps mentioned in answer here [error i was getting is same as asked in question in that link]
finally i got tensorflow .whl file.

i removed the tensorflow which was installed via pip install tensorflow-gpu and installed the one that i built.

now again the main problem remains same as asked here

including intel mkl or ngraph make image resizing happen on gpu while training? so that load on cpu will be reduced..
i remember some error by ngraph while building, so removed it while building..
have been building tensorflow with different versions to make entire training happen on GPU.

this time r1.11 build succeeded after 4.5 hours of compilation time!
before building, when i ran py config.py i had turned off ngraph support and didn't build with intel mkl library

bazel-bin\tensorflow\tools\pip_package\build_pip_package C:/tmp/tensorflow_pkg
first i deleted simple_console_for_windows.zip  which was 0 bytes then followed steps mentioned in answer here    [error i was getting is same as asked in question in that link]
finally i got tensorflow .whl file.
i removed the tensorflow which was installed via pip install tensorflow-gpu and installed the one that i built.
now again the main problem remains same as asked here

body:
Finally Build succeeded with tensorflow r1.11  (i tried r1.5, 1.9    but they failed)
this time r1.11 build succeeded after 4.5 hours of compilation time! 
before building, when i ran `py config.py` i had turned off `ngraph `support and didn't build with intel `mkl `library

it showed too many warnings while building.. after building the library it showed error when i execute below command 
`bazel-bin\tensorflow\tools\pip_package\build_pip_package C:/tmp/tensorflow_pkg`

first i deleted `simple_console_for_windows.zip`  which was 0 bytes then followed steps mentioned in answer [here ](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/52394305/creating-pip-package-for-tensorflow-with-gpu-support-results-in-0-byte-simple-co/52398168)   [error i was getting is same as asked in question in that link]
finally i got tensorflow .whl file.

i removed the tensorflow which was installed via `pip install tensorflow-gpu `and installed the one that i built.

now again the main problem remains same as asked [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/models/issues/1942)


including intel `mkl ` or  `ngraph `make image resizing happen on gpu while training?  so that load on cpu will be reduced..  
i remember some error by ngraph while building, so removed it while building..
have been building tensorflow with different versions to make entire training happen on GPU.
